# title

**Instance Property**

The title of the alert.

## Declaration

```swift
var title: LocalizedStringResource
```

## Creating a button

- **init(title:stopButton:secondaryButton:secondaryButtonBehavior:)**: Creates an alert for an alarm.
- **stopButton**: The appearance of the stop button.

items.description: Creates an alert for an alarm.
